contextCheck: Before suggesting code, check existing files and folder structure. Confirm if /app/auth/, /app/polls/, and /lib/supabaseClient.ts exist. Adapt responses to the current project progress.

rules.description: All new pages should be placed under /app/. Authentication pages in /app/auth/, poll-related pages in /app/polls/, API routes in /app/api/.
Use react-hook-form with shadcn/ui components (Input, Button, FormField). Do not use plain HTML forms unless explicitly requested.
All authentication logic should use supabase.auth methods from /lib/supabaseClient.ts. Do not create new clients unless necessary.
Database operations should go through supabase.from('table') queries, never raw SQL. Keep queries in /app/api/ or /lib/ services.

When scaffolding new features (e.g., creating a poll form), follow existing patterns (AuthContext, shadcn/ui components, folder rules). Always generate minimal, working placeholders before advanced logic.
